text: Mike Hallett is an American football coach. He currently serves as the Co- Offensive Coordinator and offensive line coach at the University of Toledo. Hallet served as the head coach at Thomas More College in Crestview Hills, Kentucky from 2004 to 2006 and at Heidelberg College from 2007 to 2015. ==Head coaching record== ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American football defensive linemen Category:Heidelberg Student Princes football coaches Category:Mount Union Purple Raiders football players Category:Thomas More Saints football coaches Category:Toledo Rockets football coaches Category:Wooster Fighting Scots football coaches Category:High school football coaches in Ohio
title: Mike Hallett (American football)
